description:
The physical and mental battle of attrition between Marui and Kite versus Tono and Kimijima ends unexpectedly. In contrast with the ruthless match, as No. 5 Oni quietly stands alone on the court, Toyama challenges him to a game. Toyama`s skills have improved through training with the losers. To become the best player in Japan, he wants to beat Oni. They more they play, the more his pure fighting spirit fans the flames inside Oni!
Meanwhile, on another court Ryoma asks Ryoga how to hit the Byodoin`s glowing shot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Embrace the 10 Ball Strike and Sleep
